a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

img.alt: Charlotte Oriole mascot pointing to sticky note that says, "I'm proud to be a Charlotte Oriole because of our sports community and flight club."

div.p: Face to Face education has been canceled through June 30, 2020.
For additional resources and announcements regarding COVID-19 please click here: COVID-19 Resources and Announcements
Charlotte is a community where black and orange “Oriole Pride” runs deep and where one of our best qualities is the collaboration and support between the community and school district.

Charlotte Public Schools is a vibrant and energetic district that prepares students for lifelong learning. Staff, student and community member passion for this district is what makes Charlotte Public Schools a point of pride.

The mission of the Charlotte Public Schools is to provide an excellent educational culture and learning environment which is safe, student centered and in collaboration with our parents and community. We aspire to ensure students are prepared with the academic competencies and social skills for successful futures and lifelong learning.
Join Us at the Stadium on April 24

div.div: CPS Continuity of Learning Plan Approved

span.a: PDF File Read the approved plan

div.p: Documents available outlining various aspects of the plan
CPS staff members offer messages of hope and love to students at home

div.div: Supports Available for Those in Need

div.p: Food and technology support programs are available to help keep kids fed and learning at home
